0.1.0.name: lisboa-syntax
0.1.0.readme:
# lisboa-syntax
An Atom theme

### Install using Atom

1. Go to 'Atom -> Edit -> Preferences'
2. Then select the 'Themes' tab
3. Enter 'Lisboa' in the search box

### Activating the theme

Go to 'Atom -> Preferences...', click in the 'Themes' tab, and select 'Lisboa' in the 'Syntax Theme' dropdown.

readme:
# lisboa-syntax
An Atom theme

Currently supports Javascript, json, html, css and xml languages

##Javascript
![Screenshot](https://github.com/afnpires/lisboa-syntax/raw/master/prints/javascript.png)

##Json
![Screenshot](https://github.com/afnpires/lisboa-syntax/raw/master/prints/json.png)

##html
![Screenshot](https://github.com/afnpires/lisboa-syntax/raw/master/prints/html.png)

##css
![Screenshot](https://github.com/afnpires/lisboa-syntax/raw/master/prints/css.png)

## Installation

APM: `apm install lisboa-syntax`

Preferences:

1. Go to `Preferences > Install` and choose `Themes`
2. Search for `lisboa-syntax` and install it
3. Go to `Preferences > Themes` and choose Lisboa as the syntax theme
